statements: DELETE FROM waste_info WHERE location = 'Recycling Center';
DELETE FROM waste_info WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM waste_info WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' AND quantity > 100;
DELETE FROM waste_info WHERE waste_type = 'Metal' AND location = 'California' AND quantity < 50;
DELETE FROM waste_info WHERE collection_date < CURDATE()
DELETE FROM waste_info WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York')
DELETE FROM WasteQuantities WHERE quantity_id IN (SELECT quantity_id FROM WasteQuantities WHERE waste_type_id = 2);
DELETE FROM WasteLocations WHERE location_id = (SELECT location_id FROM WasteLocations WHERE location_name = 'Warehouse A');
DELETE FROM Quantities WHERE location_id = 3 AND quantity > 100
DELETE FROM waste_quantities WHERE quantity_id IN (SELECT quantity_id FROM waste_quantities WHERE waste_type_id = 1);
